feed.title: My Little Jekyll
feed.subtitle: Romina Case is a web developer based in Denver, Colorado. She's currently learning Java and, apparently, Jekyll.

entry.title: Stop Sniffing my Browser!
entry.content:
Since Jekyll is all about static pages, you can create and edit your posts directly in the _posts directory.

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets. Hereâ€™s a brilliant bit of Ruby code:

Proin massa metus, hendrerit eu odio eu, bibendum tincidunt sem. Donec tristique ac neque ac commodo. Cras sed euismod tortor, in ullamcorper ligula. Ut maximus augue nec ipsum pulvinar suscipit. Duis dignissim scelerisque velit, sed consectetur elit condimentum in.

Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus.

Cras dolor nunc, auctor a blandit ac, commodo eu orci.
entry.summary: Since Jekyll is all about static pages, you can create and edit your posts directly in the _posts directory.

entry.title: No More Puns, Please
